basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: Full-Stack Web Developer | Java • Vue.js • Docker • PHP • React
basics.summary: Experienced Software Developer and father who values integrity and desires a thorough knowledge of his profession. A passionate, patient, and adaptable quick learner with excellent technical skills, and who excels at creating and executing a plan both independently and as part of a team.

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services
work.summary:
Developed and maintained Brightside Rental Management Software, a complex Java-based system built with GWT, serving as a core contributor on a 4-person dev team. Led efforts to implement Test-Driven Development (TDD) in a legacy codebase and collaborated on refactoring Java modules to improve performance and reliability.

Architected and implemented six third-party API integrations (REST, GraphQL, and custom protocols), enabling seamless data flow between Brightside and external platforms. Partnered with another developer to initiate a complete front-end overhaul from GWT to Vue.js, modernizing the user experience and improving development velocity.

Championed Agile and Lean development practices, combining Scrum and Kanban approaches. Introduced structured code review processes and Git-based workflows to improve code quality and team collaboration. Built and maintained multiple client websites using WordPress, Concrete CMS, and native PHP, and authored internal documentation and training materials for ongoing support.
highlights: Maintained enterprise apps; refactored legacy code and implemented TDD
Built 6 third-party integrations (REST, GraphQL, and custom APIs)
Co-led front-end migration from GWT to Vue.js for modernized UI
Introduced Agile (Scrum/Kanban) workflows and team-wide code reviews
Developed and maintained client websites (WordPress, Concrete CMS, PHP)

work.name: AAM, USA
work.summary:
Designed and maintained multiple production-grade web applications for hundreds of automotive installers across North America, collaborating within a 10-person development team. Personally led the overhaul of the cart and checkout system in the company’s flagship product, significantly improving performance, UX, and maintainability.

Worked alongside the lead developer to architect and launch a next-generation point-of-sale (POS) platform, built with React and TypeScript, introducing modern design patterns and enhanced real-time responsiveness. Applications were developed using PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, and React within a custom MVC framework.

Used GitHub for source control and task coordination, and contributed regularly to sprint planning and cross-team collaboration via Microsoft communication tools.
highlights: Redesigned and rebuilt the flagship checkout/cart system, improving UX and maintainability
Co-designed and built a cutting-edge React/TypeScript point-of-sale platform
Developed and maintained internal and client-facing tools in PHP, JS, MySQL, and React (MVC framework)
Collaborated with 10-person dev team and multiple stakeholders using GitHub, Asana, and Microsoft Teams for agile delivery

work.name: Unbound Digital
work.summary: Managed Help Desk team as it quintupled in size from 1 to 5 members. Developed and documented standard workflows and designed performance metrics to determine KPQs and KPIs. Installed computer systems in a wide range of office and residential locations, including individual PCs, client/server workstations, and peer to peer clients, and configured network settings accordingly.
highlights: Monitored and maintained 1400+ devices across 100+ clients
Coordinated with clients to develop requirements, expectations, and manage projects
Successfully communicated technical issues and terms to laymen

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
work.summary: Worked with Dentsply inLab CAD/CAM software, scanner, and mill to design and create fixed and removable dental prostheses.
highlights: Designed and fabricated fixed and removable dental prostheses using Dentsply inLab CAD/CAM software
Operated 3D printers and milling machines with high precision
Maintained computer systems and networked devices in a lab environment

work.name: Gray Station Dental
work.summary: Prior to tech, led a dental team for 10+ years, managing equipment installs, schedules, and patient care.
highlights: Managed 6 simultaneous schedules with a team of 3
Learned documentation skills that exceed healthcare requirements

projects.description: Currently pursuing AWS certification with live EC2 deployment projects in progress. Deploying personal web apps using EC2, S3, and GitHub Actions for CI/CD.

projects.name: Concrete CMS Docker Stack
projects.description: A fully functional Concrete CMS installation packaged into a Dockerized deployment stack using docker-compose, designed for rapid and consistent rollout across multiple client environments.

projects.name: Java Integration Example
projects.description: A sample third party integration written in Java. Meant as an educational tool - it illustrates design patterns, techniques, and best practices commonly used in Java backend projects

projects.name: Bootstrap Showcase
projects.description: Sample static website that illustrates understanding of bootstrap css and js usage.

projects.name: Lights Out
projects.description: Recreated the classic "Lights Out" puzzle in Vue.js as a logic-game challenge.

projects.name: Vue Snake
projects.description: Built a responsive Snake game in Vue.js as a component-driven learning exercise.
